headline.main: Bruins Donate $200,000 to Player Injured at Winter Classic
headline.print_headline: Bruins Donate $200,000 to Player Injured at Winter Classic

docs.snippet: The owners of the Boston Bruins say they will donate at least $200,000 to help the professional women's hockey player who suffered a spinal cord injury at the Winter Classic....
docs.lead_paragraph: The owners of the Boston Bruins say they will donate at least $200,000 to help the professional women's hockey player who suffered a spinal cord injury at the Winter Classic.

headline.main: Former FBI Agent Levinson Not Among Those to Be Freed by Iran
headline.print_headline: Former FBI Agent Levinson Not Among Those to Be Freed by Iran

docs.snippet: One prominent name was missing from the list of Americans to be released by Iran on Saturday: former U.S. law-enforcement agent Robert Levinson, who disappeared while visiting the country in 2007....
docs.lead_paragraph: One prominent name was missing from the list of Americans to be released by Iran on Saturday: former U.S. law-enforcement agent Robert Levinson, who disappeared while visiting the country in 2007.

headline.main: Kings Lock Up Center Anze Kopitar With 8-Year, $80M Contract
headline.print_headline: Kings Lock Up Center Anze Kopitar With 8-Year, $80M Contract

docs.snippet: Anze Kopitar agreed to an eight-year, $80 million contract extension with the Kings on Saturday, keeping Los Angeles' franchise center with the club through the 2023-24 season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar agreed to an eight-year, $80 million contract extension with the Kings on Saturday, keeping Los Angeles' franchise center with the club through the 2023-24 season.

headline.main: Obama Signs Emergency Order Over Flint Water
headline.print_headline: Obama Signs Emergency Order Over Flint Water

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama signed an emergency declaration Saturday that clears the way for federal aid for Flint, Michigan, which is undergoing a drinking water crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama signed an emergency declaration Saturday that clears the way for federal aid for Flint, Michigan, which is undergoing a drinking water crisis.

headline.main: Martin Leads Oklahoma St to 73-42 Blowout of No. 14 Sooners
headline.print_headline: Martin Leads Oklahoma St to 73-42 Blowout of No. 14 Sooners

docs.snippet: Brittney Martin scored 19 points, surpassing 1,500 for her career, and added 14 rebounds to lead Oklahoma State to a dominating 73-42 victory over No. 14 Oklahoma on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brittney Martin scored 19 points, surpassing 1,500 for her career, and added 14 rebounds to lead Oklahoma State to a dominating 73-42 victory over No. 14 Oklahoma on Saturday.

headline.main: 'Bei Bei' the Giant Panda Cub Makes Public Debut at National Zoo
headline.print_headline: 'Bei Bei' the Giant Panda Cub Makes Public Debut at National Zoo

docs.snippet: A nearly five-month-old giant panda made his public debut on Saturday at the Smithsonian National Zoo in Washington, where he mostly slept through visits by dozens of tourists eager for a first glimpse at the pudgy cub....
docs.lead_paragraph: A nearly five-month-old giant panda made his public debut on Saturday at the Smithsonian National Zoo in Washington, where he mostly slept through visits by dozens of tourists eager for a first glimpse at the pudgy cub.

headline.main: Timeline: U.S.-Iran Relations From 1953 Coup to 2016 Prisoner Swap
headline.print_headline: Timeline: U.S.-Iran Relations From 1953 Coup to 2016 Prisoner Swap

docs.snippet: Iran freed five Americans including a Washington Post reporter on Saturday as the two countries staged a series of goodwill gestures ahead of the expected announcement of the lifting of international sanctions against Tehran under a nuclear deal....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran freed five Americans including a Washington Post reporter on Saturday as the two countries staged a series of goodwill gestures ahead of the expected announcement of the lifting of international sanctions against Tehran under a nuclear deal.

headline.main: No. 6 Villanova Survives Scare to Beat Georgetown
headline.print_headline: No. 6 Villanova Survives Scare to Beat Georgetown

docs.snippet: Josh Hart had 15 points and 12 rebounds as No. 6 Villanova took advantage of a cold-shooting, mistake-heavy rival and survived its own second-half cold spell to beat Georgetown 55-50 on Saturday for their 21st consecutive Big East victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Hart had 15 points and 12 rebounds as No. 6 Villanova took advantage of a cold-shooting, mistake-heavy rival and survived its own second-half cold spell to beat Georgetown 55-50 on Saturday for their 21st consecutive Big East victory.

headline.main: Obama Declares Emergency in Michigan Over Bad Water-White House
headline.print_headline: Obama Declares Emergency in Michigan Over Bad Water-White House

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama declared a state of emergency in Michigan on Saturday and ordered federal aid for state and local response efforts in the county where the city of Flint has been contending with lead-contaminated drinking water....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama declared a state of emergency in Michigan on Saturday and ordered federal aid for state and local response efforts in the county where the city of Flint has been contending with lead-contaminated drinking water.
